Class ConvertXmlToTextTask

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ConvertXmlToTextTask
extends AbstractFindBugsTask
    Ant task to generate HTML or plain text from a saved XML analysis results file.
    Author:
    David Hovemeyer
